original_text: When the service had been prepared for, the priests stood in their place, and the Levites in their divisions according to the king's command.
korean_text: 이와 같이 섬길 일이 구비되매 왕의 명령을 따라 제사장들은 그들의 처소에 서고 레위 사람들은 그들의 반열대로 서고

sentences.original_text: When the service had been prepared for,
the priests stood in their place,
and the Levites in their divisions
